alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwestern Brooks Range; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 7:19PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Strong Storm Likely Impacting the North Slope This Weekend... A strong storm developing over the Chukchi Sea on Friday has the potential to bring high impact weather to the North Slope as it tracks east across the Beaufort Sea this weekend. Very strong westerly winds, high surf, minor coastal flooding, and ice pushing up on the beach are all possible with this storm. The strongest winds are expected along the coast. At this time, there is still some uncertainty with the exact track and strength of the storm. Small shifts in the track can result in considerably different impacts. We will continue to monitor this system and provide updates over the next few days.
